Please click on the link below for information on upcoming trade events worldwide, including Brazil: http://www.export.gov/tradeevents/index.asp.

The Department of Commerce organizes trade missions throughout the world; for more complete information, please visit http://export.gov/trademissions/index.asp. The Department of Commerce also brings International Buyers to U.S. Trade Shows through its International Buyers Program. Learn more about this worldwide service at http://export.gov/ibp/eg_main_018009.asp.
